source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Raven illustration in a line and watercolour wash technique
items.headline: Illustrate a Raven in characteristic line and watercolour.
objectives_summary: Line and wash technique
Basic watercolour washes and brush strokes
use characteristic lines to make your illustration unique

items.title: Learn to Draw a Real Life Still LIfe

visible_instructors.title: Amy Stewart
visible_instructors.name: Amy
visible_instructors.job_title: New York Times Bestselling Author & Artist

items.headline: With Ink and Watercolor
objectives_summary: How to identify a "real life" still life
How to compose a still life
How to draw a still life with a single line

items.title: Indian Saree Blouse Stitching Course For Beginners

visible_instructors.job_title: Entrepreneur, Diploma holder in soaps and cosmetics
visible_instructors.name: Praseela
visible_instructors.title: Praseela N

items.headline: step by step guide how to stitch Indian Saree Blouse in professional way by your own
objectives_summary: By learning this course you can stitch your own Saree Blouse in professional way and can take orders too.

items.title: 8 common issues with gouache and 24 ideas to address them
items.headline: For all gouache painters, learn how to solve the most common issues with gouache to improve as a gouache painter
objectives_summary: How to get the right gouache consistency
How to deal with the gouache drying on the palette
How to blend easily in different ways

items.title: The Ultimate Guide to Watercolor Painting of Fruits!
items.headline: Learn to Paint 11 different fruits projects using water colors
objectives_summary: This is going to be the best course on Water color painting cum drawing for everyone. This is a two in one course in which students will be able to learn the basics of water color painting techniques, they can even learn how to draw different types of fruits which is optional here. There are videos in this course which will help student to learn water color painting from scratch by doing 11 different projects along with me during the course.

items.title: Learn Watercolor Northern Lights, Aurora & Galaxy Painting
items.headline: Learn some beginner watercolor techniques to paint 6 different northern lights and galaxy landscape paintings with me
objectives_summary: You will learn to paint different watercolor Northern lights or Galaxy Paintings. Each process will be guided slowly step by step.

items.title: How to Paint Street Scenes in Watercolour
items.headline: Learn how to paint 6 different street scenes from around the world!
objectives_summary: How to create fresh and vibrant street landscapes by following a two-step layering process.
How to build your confidence in using strong and vibrant colors.
How to be deliberate in your brushstrokes and use of color.

items.title: Drawing with Perspective - The Easiest Way to Draw Perfectly
items.headline: The fastest way to start drawing everyday scenes with perfect perspectives. Add realism to your drawing!
objectives_summary: Drawing
Perspective Drawing
Sketching

items.title: Bullet Journaling for Wellness
items.headline: A beginners course on using bullet journaling to help yourself stay sane and get you organised.
objectives_summary: How to combine elements & the importance of colours.  How to create a unique and personalised journal.  How to use different types of pages to promote your wellbeing. How to deal with mistakes and negativity.

items.title: How to Paint Flowers Step by Step
items.headline: Discover the Creative Process and Create an Original Floral Painting
objectives_summary: How to draw many types of flowers
Simple painting techniques
How to create a painting from what you've learned

items.title: Irises in Watercolor. Pen & Ink Study
items.headline: Flowers in Watercolor. Pen Ink Watercolor
objectives_summary: You will get how to paint Flowers in Watercolor
You will learn how to paint Irises in the wet-on-wet watercolor technique
You will paint the outline in ink

items.title: Madhubani Art (Mithila Painting)
items.headline: Learn madhubani art for all age groups
objectives_summary: Knowledge Exposure About Madhubani Art and Its Various Types.
Basic to Advance Learning
Learning by Doing (Step by Step)

items.title: Tropical Fruit Series: PAPAYA [course 2] in Watercolor
items.headline: Paint cute fruit postcards while practicing main watercolor techniques. This is the second course of the series!
objectives_summary: How to select art materials to paint a realistic fruit painting.
How to draw shapes of a papaya fruit.
How to mix colors to achieve the best color combinations to paint papaya.

items.title: Pop up baby album making workshop

visible_instructors.title: Priyanka gupta
visible_instructors.name: Priyanka
visible_instructors.job_title: crafter/ artist/ instructor/ paper craft designer

items.headline: Kiddie baby album
objectives_summary: learn how to make an album from scratch
learn how to make a flexible binding suitable for pop ups
learn how to make different style of pop ups and embellishing

items.title: Learn How To Use Drawing To Become More Mindful
items.headline: See how different drawing techniques can help you create more mindful experiences in your life.
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to switch meditation for drawing and become more mindful.
You will look at 3 different techniques to see what works for you.
This course will take 2 - 3 hours so you have plenty of opportunity to try all sorts of different styles.

items.title: Fundamentals of Watercolours for Beginners and Beyond Part 2
items.headline: This is a course for the beginner to learn fundamental lessons about drawing that will enable the student to progress
objectives_summary: In the first two lessons the student will learn the basics of the colour wheel, where colours are located on the wheel, along with their compliments.
The next lesson will cover buildings and how to make them more interesting, in both the drawing and painting.
We will next cover the painting of individual trees as well as the trees in the landscape,
